work_foundation: Survey & setting-out; temporary works; piling/pit support; excavation & dewatering (B1 area)
Excavate to formation; blinding; first batch of pile caps & ground beams; embeds/sleeves
Continue pile caps & ground beams; basement slab; waterstop & waterproofing details
Foundation wrap-up; basement exterior walls & partial backfill; 1F formwork/falsework acceptance

work_superstructure: Start superstructure: 1F columns/beams/slab; core wall; embeds & openings coordination
Climb up to 2F; stairs; link beams; check MEP sleeves
Climb up to 3F; slab openings & reinforcement; façade embeds setting-out
Climb up to 4F; plan roof access & openings
Reach 5F – roof primary frame: columns/wall upstands and main/edge beams in place; parapet edge beams aligned (no roof slab yet).
5F roof slab poured: roof structural slab cast; major roof openings reserved.
Computer room floor finished: RF (roof) structure formed; façade structural closure
Structural acceptance & touch-ups; ready for façade/MEP full-scale work
work_mep_wsd: Early MEP preparation: Risers & shafts, equipment bases, firestop mock-ups; coordinate with structural touch-ups

work_superstructure: Temporary waterproofing measures (such as a membrane or coating)
work_mep_wsd: Level mains rollout (-1F–1F priority): Main cable trays, ducts, WSD piping; first pressure tests
work_interior: Basement to 1F: external walls, floor slabs, and roof over B1. Includes external waterproofing and backfill. [Hidden works: base sealing, underground cable sleeves]

work_mep_wsd: Mid-phase (2F–3F installation): Ducts, sprinklers, BMS cabling, FCU bases; wiring & insulation (low zone)
work_interior: 2F–5F: external wall masonry and slab construction. [Hidden: lintel waterproofing, embedded MEP sleeves]

work_mep_wsd: Mid-phase (4F–RF installation): Upper zone ducts/trays/sprinklers; coordination with roof drainage and parapet
work_interior: Equipment floor: outer walls and top slab. Full internal walls (all floors). [Hidden: shaft closures, wall backing, MEP clearance zones]

work_mep_wsd: Pump room works: Pump room installation, electrical DB bases, preliminary loop
work_interior: Roof parapet walls and full curtain wall installation. [Hidden: curtain fixings, joint sealants]

work_mep_wsd: Terminal devices & loop checks: FCUs, diffusers, lighting, plumbing fixtures; partial power-on
work_interior: Interior plastering and ceilings (start from lower floors). [Hidden: plaster benchmarks, concealed MEP inspections]

work_mep_wsd: Commissioning & balancing: System loop verification; air/water balancing
work_interior: Stairs and ramps (all floors). [Hidden: handrail base plates, nosing form details]

work_mep_wsd: Integrated testing & Final acceptance: Subsystem integration; control system calibration; End devices verification, as-built documentation, overall MEP acceptance
work_interior: 50% of doors and windows. Floor screed and base paint. [Hidden: fire sealants, slope levelling]
work_outdoor: Start external works: yard subbase; tie-in to external utilities (storm/sanitary, water, telecom)

work_interior: Remaining 50% doors/windows, railings, and steel canopies. [Hidden: welding touch-ups, silicone seals]
work_outdoor: Road base layers; fence foundations; light pole bases

work_interior: Protective flooring, soft trims. [Hidden: corner guards, adhesive layers]
work_outdoor: Road wearing course; gully improvements; signage foundations

work_interior: Final cleaning, defect checks, and handover. [Hidden: signage, loose furniture, testing tags]
work_outdoor: Landscaping & irrigation lines; external equipment pads
Street furniture/bollards; lighting erection & energization; outdoor security points close-out
work_handover: Integrated testing & commissioning peak: fire linkage, low-voltage platform, trial run; O&M/as-built docs
Defect clearance & re-tests; statutory/specialty inspections; final acceptance & demobilization
